Command line: /opt/powerlab/bin/stats-collect start -H bdwep1 --stats=all -o good sleep 5
Collecting bdwep1 system information
Starting statistics collectors
Running the following command on host 'bdwep1': sleep 5
Stopping statistics collectors
Collecting more bdwep1 system information
Copy collected statistics from 'bdwep1' to '/home/adamjame/powerlab/git/stats-collect/good'
